steps.step: Lightly dust working surface with flour. Roll out pizza dough into a rectangle
Add a layer of Shredded Mozzarella Cheese. Add a layer of Pepperoni. Add a layer of Salami. Repeat.
Roll the dough up tightly and seal edges. Cut small slits across the top every 2 inches. Place onto a baking sheet and bake at 375F for 20-25 minutes
